group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Augh!
*Pant* *Whimper*
It's just like Kanagi said...
Our attacks don't faze her at all. She @doesn't even flinch.

group_1.textRight: Yeah. I was goin' full power without even@realizin' it and she doesn't seem to care.

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe she doesn't even have a @scratch, even after all that.

group_1.textRight: Believing we had to hold back sure was@wishful thinking.

group_1.textLeft: [surround:7022_earthquake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Waaaaaagh!

group_1.textRight: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]Oof! Can't stay standin'!

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]Sana, hold on!

group_1.textRight: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]I-I will! Is Eve causing this quake?!
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]Yes!
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]This might cause another landslide, just like@it did earlier!
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]Careful, everyone!

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]Eve...

group_1.narration: ― Sana ―@She's too heavy!@Her wings aren't doing anything!
— Kaede —@I-it doesn't matter, if she can jump that@far she'll get to Kamihama in no time!
― Momoko ―@Oh, this is REAL bad!@She's aimin' for Sankyo Ward...
― Rena ―@She'll come down like a cannonball.@This is horrible!

group_1.textRight: Unbelievable. She wreaked that much havoc@just by jumpin' once...

group_1.textLeft: Imagine if she did that inside the city.

group_1.textRight: I don't even want to think about it, but...

group_1.textCenter: (This reminds me of those terrible nights@with Walpurgisnacht.)

group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant*
That was a huge quake just now! Is everyone@all right?
Thank heavens, you're all unharmed.

group_1.textLeft: I knew it! It's you, Coordinator!

group_1.textRight: Everything started shaking so suddenly! I @was worried something awful had happened.
Was that Eve's doing?

group_1.textLeft: Yep. She leapt right up into the air over@there just a minute ago...

group_1.textRight: I see. I was hoping I could help in some @way, but...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we figured out Eve was actually Ui, @so...
We might have gone a bit TOO easy on her.

group_1.textRight: Wait what?!
You can't have just said what I think you@just said.
Ui is Iroha's little sister, isn't she?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
The Eternal Sakura bloomed when it touched@her, so I know now that it's her.

group_1.textRight: I...see...
Then it's a good thing I came!
There may be something I can do to help.

group_1.textLeft: Help? What do you know that we don't?

group_1.textRight: As the Coordinator, I've seen the memories@of a lot of girls.
One comes to learn a lot of things in my line@of work.
I'm everyone's Coordinator, after all.
I know all about you, Momoko, and I know@all about Iroha, too.
Naturally, I'm also very well-informed about@the Magius.
And I know that their memories are correct@as well.

group_1.textLeft: Their memories...
Please, tell me whatever you know!

group_1.textRight: Of course.
You've already heard about the Magius's goals@and their "Half-Witch", right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: That's good. I can keep this brief.
There's not much time, so I'll explain as@concisely as I can.
Suffice to say there's a simple way to save@Ui.
You'll have to defeat Eve, and then extract@her from where she's buried inside.

group_1.textLeft: Th-that sounds violent...
What would happen to Ui if I hit her?

group_1.textRight: Don't worry, Iroha.
I wouldn't have said that if I didn't have a@reason.

group_1.narration: First off, the Magius's goal, this "hatching"@is actually Witch transformation.@Which means, Eve has a Soul Gem.
The three of them sensed a magic not unlike@a Magical Girl's in Eve's belly before she@began growing. That is unequivocal proof.
What's more, the further back I went in@their memories, the more obvious it was that@something had enveloped that magic.
It became more difficult to sense as Eve grew@larger, and the Magius seem to have taken@that as a sign that it was close to hatching.
But now I think that what they were sensing@was the magic from a Magical Girl's Soul Gem,@powering its owner's human body.

group_1.textLeft: Its owner... The Eternal Sakura bloomed,@so that girl must be...

group_1.textRight: Yes. When you take into account what you@told me, the girl inside Eve must be Ui.

group_1.textLeft: But is it still okay to attack her...?
It's good we know she's inside, but we've@no idea what a strong blow might do...

group_1.textRight: You've watched a Magical Girl turn into a@Witch, Momoko. You should understand this.
Soul Gems and Magical Girls are linked.@So are Grief Seeds and Witches.
The two combinations are ineffable.
It's completely unheard of for the two @sets to coexist in one form.
So my suggestion is to not think of it as@Eve being connected to Ui's Soul Gem...
But rather as Ui clad in a body formed @by her power to collect energy.
Essentially, "Eve" is like a costume that@she is inside of.

group_1.textLeft: If Eve is a costume...then even if you tear@it apart, it won't affect Ui...

group_1.textRight: That's right. So you should definitely be@able to pull her free from it.

group_1.textLeft: The problem is whether or not we can take@this huge Half-Witch out.

group_1.textRight: Much like how humans have vital areas and@Magical Girls have Soul Gems...
A Witch should have sensitive points and@weak spots, too.
That goes doubly for an unstable creature@like Eve.

group_1.textLeft: So we'll have to scout out where that weak@spot is...

group_1.textRight: Precisely.
I'm sorry all I can offer you are guesses...
But maybe now there's a little hope to light@your way, Iroha?

group_1.textLeft: There is. Thank you...

group_1.textRight: Then I'm glad I could help, even if I wasn't@able to help you fight.
Now that we know that we can go all out@on Eve and save Kamihama and Ui!
Yep, yep!

group_1.textLeft: You're right!

group_1.narration: — Iroha —@To defeat Eve is to save everyone.
But we need to act fast... Eve's Familiars@are creating chaos as we speak.
